preface.simpara: This document offers a comprehensive preview of the templates used for Alan documentation, offering samples of how fonts, typography, AsciiDoc elements, custom styles and syntax highlighting will be rendered and styled in the final documentation, allowing to compare quality and differences across all the supported output formats.
Some contents are format dependent and will vary according to the document’s output format and the backend employed, providing additional information specific to that format and/or backend.
